# {{VITE_APP_NAME}} - Vendor Management Dashboard

> Manage your vending machines, orders, and services from one dashboard.

## Overview
[About Tapayoka vendor dashboard for managing vending devices, monitoring orders, configuring services, and viewing analytics]

## Core Features
[Device management, order monitoring, service configuration, analytics, real-time dashboard]

## Key Pages
- `/login` - Vendor login page (only public page)
- Dashboard pages require authentication

## Technical Details
- React + TypeScript frontend
- Firebase authentication
- Single language (English)

- Website: https://{{VITE_APP_DOMAIN}}

[Brief guidance - note that most of the app is behind authentication]
